title: 1.12.2能看各种机器内部储电量的，AE线缆频道的MOD是啥
author: xiaojian_dada

replies.author: gh44
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 gh44 于 2019-7-3 18:25 编辑 

[1.14-1.9.4][TheoneProbe——检测器]显示物品的另一个选择
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-717654-1-1.html
附属MOD，拓展了TOP对[FR]林业、[TiC]匠魂、BM、IC2、NeoTech(全新科技)和储物抽屉等模组的兼容
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/778.html
介绍视频
https://www.bilibili.com/video/a ... 8274779106221759337
或者
[1.12.2-1.14][Hwyla]Here's What You're Looking At
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/668.html
